mapper.insert: INSERT INTO options(eo_fk, pcc_fk, product_fk, option_name, option_price, option_flag, option_seq, option_barcode_number1, option_barcode_number2, option_remark, option_tax_flag, option_stock_flag, option_stock, option_stock_max_alarm, option_excel_color_check, option_memo1, option_memo2, option_memo3, option_memo4, option_thumbnail1, option_thumbnail2,option_update, option_regdate, option_cost, option_cost_flag, option_supply_cost,another_option_pk, another_option_qty) VALUES(#{eoFk}, #{pccFk}, #{productFk}, #{optionName}, #{optionPrice}, #{optionFlag}, #{optionSeq}, #{optionBarcodeNumber1},#{optionBarcodeNumber2}, #{optionRemark}, #{optionTaxFlag}, #{optionStockFlag} ,#{optionStock}, #{optionStockMaxAlarm}, #{optionExcelColorCheck}, #{optionMemo1}, #{optionMemo2}, #{optionMemo3}, #{optionMemo4}, #{optionThumbnail1}, #{optionThumbnail2}, NOW(), NOW(), #{optionCost}, #{optionCostFlag}, #{optionSupplyCost}, #{anotherOptionPk}, #{anotherOptionQty})
mapper.update: UPDATE options SET eo_fk = #{eoFk}, pcc_fk = #{pccFk}, option_name = #{optionName}, option_price = #{optionPrice}, option_flag = #{optionFlag}, option_seq = #{optionSeq}, option_barcode_number1 = #{optionBarcodeNumber1}, option_barcode_number2 = #{optionBarcodeNumber2}, option_remark = #{optionRemark}, option_tax_flag = #{optionTaxFlag}, option_stock = #{optionStock}, option_stock_flag = #{optionStockFlag}, option_stock_max_alarm = #{optionStockMaxAlarm}, option_excel_color_check = #{optionExcelColorCheck}, option_memo1 = #{optionMemo1}, option_memo2 = #{optionMemo2}, option_memo3 = #{optionMemo3}, option_memo4 = #{optionMemo4}, option_thumbnail1 = #{optionThumbnail1}, option_thumbnail2 = #{optionThumbnail2}, option_update = NOW(), option_cost = #{optionCost}, option_cost_flag = #{optionCostFlag}, another_option_pk = #{anotherOptionPk}, another_option_qty = #{anotherOptionQty}, option_supply_cost = #{optionSupplyCost} WHERE option_pk = #{optionPk}
mapper.select: SELECT op.option_pk, op.eo_fk, op.pcc_fk, op.product_fk, op.option_name, op.option_price, op.option_flag, op.option_seq, op.option_remark, op.option_stock, op.option_stock_flag, op.option_stock_max_alarm, op.option_tax_flag, op.option_excel_color_check, op.option_barcode_number1, op.option_barcode_number2, op.option_memo1, op.option_memo2, op.option_memo3, op.option_memo4, op.option_thumbnail1, op.option_thumbnail2, op.option_update, op.option_regdate, op.option_cost, op.option_cost_flag, another_option_pk, another_option_qty, option_supply_cost, ocm.ocm_gram, ocm.ocm_production_divide, ocm.ocm_each, cs.cost_name, cs.cost_unique_num FROM options op LEFT JOIN options_costs_matching ocm ON ocm.option_fk = op.option_pk -- INNER JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk LEFT JOIN costs cs ON cs.cost_pk = ocm.cost_fk LEFT JOIN cost_detail cd ON cs.cd_fk = cd.cd_pk WHERE op.option_pk = #{optionPk} GROUP BY op.option_pk, op.eo_fk, op.pcc_fk, op.product_fk, op.option_name, op.option_price, op.option_flag, op.option_seq, op.option_remark, op.option_stock, op.option_stock_flag, op.option_tax_flag, op.option_stock_max_alarm, op.option_excel_color_check, op.option_barcode_number1, op.option_barcode_number2, op.option_memo1, op.option_memo2, op.option_memo3, op.option_memo4, op.option_thumbnail1, op.option_thumbnail2, op.option_update, op.option_regdate, op.option_cost, op.option_cost_flag, another_option_pk, another_option_qty, option_supply_cost, ocm.ocm_gram, ocm.ocm_production_divide, ocm.ocm_each, cs.cost_name, cs.cost_unique_num
